text: @FCC You have my promise that I’ll do what I can here, but I need you all to keep up the drumbeat on this.

The FCC just voted to hand control of the internet over to giant internet companies, but this isn’t over. Congress must step up to repeal this rule, restore net neutrality protections, and defend a fair and open internet.

RT @amyklobuchar Today's @FCC vote to end #NetNeutrality protections is bad for consumers, businesses & rural areas. These rules hold internet providers accountable & promote competition/innovation. This isn’t the last word on net neutrality, & I’ll keep fighting for a fair, free & open internet.
